resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108259</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108259</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770208271</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Half Steps and Whole Steps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halbe Jobsteps und vollständige Jobsteps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Demi d'étapes et étapes entières</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Meias etapas e etapas inteiras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Punti mezzi e punti interi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μισά βήματα και ολόκληρα βήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Medios pasos de progresión y pasos de progresión 
enteros</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The pitch of a note is how high or low it sounds. The distance between two pitches can be measured in half steps and whole steps.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Taktabstand einer Anmerkung ist, wie hoch oder 
niedrig er klingt. Der Abstand zwischen zwei Taktabständen kann
in den halben Jobsteps und in den vollständigen Jobsteps gemessen 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le lancement d'une note est comment haut ou bas il 
retentit. La distance entre deux lancements peut être mesurée 
dans demi d'étapes et étapes entières.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O passo de uma nota é como elevado ou baixo soa. 
A distância entre dois passos pode ser medida em meias etapas e
em etapas inteiras.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il passo di una nota è quanto alto o basso suona. 
La distanza fra due passi può essere misurata ai punti mezzi ed
ai punti interi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η πίσσα μιας σημείωσης είναι πόσο υψηλή ή χαμηλή 
ηχεί. Η απόσταση μεταξύ δύο πισσών μπορεί να μετρηθεί στα
μισά βήματα και ολόκληρα τα βήματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La echada de una nota es cómo es alto o bajo 
suena. La distancia entre dos echadas se puede medir en medios 
pasos de progresión y pasos de progresión enteros.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
FN:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770208271</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108259</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/half-steps-and-whole-steps</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
